name: Circuit Bending #1
description:
New series : "When it comes to abstraction I like it RAD"

With this particular piece I am seeking for minimalism, considering the same questions than my precedent works in terms of composition and colors but with less elements. The main goal behind these experimentations is to train my eyes to select and compose the RADest works out of the images that my glitch processes generate.

That human to machine conversation I have on a daily basis is pretty simple : I ask glitchy things to my computer through command lines, it responds with whatever these glitch things means to it. Then I decide if this answer is RAD enough and I repeat that process until I feel satisfied about the discussion.

We don't process informations the same way so I learn a lot from these everyday exchanges.
 
These NFTs you collect are the most interesting topics we have.
